lead_paragraph: Former pro football quarterback and Heisman Trophy winner Troy Smith was arrested early on Sunday on suspicion of marijuana possession and driving under the influence, police said.

headline.print_headline: Ex-Heisman Winner Troy Smith Arrested on DUI and Drug Charge
headline.main: Ex-Heisman Winner Troy Smith Arrested on DUI and Drug Charge
